messages.content: Fyllo सेट झाले आहे का
messages.en: Is Fyllo set?
messages.standalone_question: Is Fyllo set up?
messages.standalone_en: Is Fyllo set up?

faq:
Q: How does the Fyllo device work?
A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

Q: What makes Fyllo different from its competitors?
A: Fyllo differentiates itself through:
 - Precision & accuracy due to unique installation and sensor positioning.
 - Agronomical Algorithms created by a team of scientists led by Dr. Shikhamany, who is considered by many as the father of Indian grape industry.
 - 100% customer retention: Fyllo is known for its service on the ground, 24-hour issue resolution.
 - User-friendly interface that's easy to understand for all language and age group users.

Q: Does Fyllo provide a fertigation schedule?
A: Yes, Fyllo provides a fertigation schedule for users.

Q: How can I trust that Fyllo's fertigation schedule is accurate?
A: Fyllo's fertigation schedule is scientifically developed and validated based on crop requirements. It takes into account factors such as crop variety, growth stage, soil conditions, and available nutrient data from soil, leaf, or petiole tests when available.

Q: How do I contact customer support for Fyllo?
A: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in. Do you want me to raise a support ticket for you?

messages.en: Yes, the Fyllo mechanism is set up and collecting data for your plot. Is there any specific information you want?

messages.content: द्राक्ष बाग कशी फुटत आहे
messages.en: How the vineyard is bursting
messages.standalone_question: How is the grape vineyard performing?
messages.standalone_en: How is the grape vineyard performing?

messages.content:
तुमच्या द्राक्ष बागेची सध्या "ब्रेक बड" (Break Bud) अवस्था आहे, जी 9 एप्रिल 2025 पासून सुरू झाली आहे. याचा अर्थ बागेत नवीन बड फुटण्याची प्रक्रिया सुरू आहे.

तथापि, हवामानाच्या ऐतिहासिक डेटाची माहिती उपलब्ध नाही कारण तुमच्या यंत्रणेत हवामान सेन्सर नाहीत. त्यामुळे तापमान, पाऊस किंवा इतर हवामानाच्या घटकांबद्दल माहिती मिळवता येत नाही.

तुमच्या बागेतील बड फुटण्याची प्रक्रिया चांगली आहे का हे तपासण्यासाठी, तुम्ही मातीच्या आसपास खोदून पाहू शकता. तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी का?
messages.en:
Your vineyard is currently in a "break bud" stage, which started on April 9, 2025. This means that a new bud is in the process of bursting in the garden.

However, historical weather data is not available because your system does not have weather sensors. Therefore, information about temperature, rainfall or other weather factors cannot be obtained.

To check if the bud bursting process in your garden is good, you can dig around the soil. Is there anything else you need to know?

messages.content: खते कोणती द्यायवी
messages.en: What fertilizers to give
messages.standalone_question: What type of fertilizer should be applied?
messages.standalone_en: What type of fertilizer should be applied?

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

messages.content:
तुमच्या द्राक्ष बागेसाठी सध्या (ब्रेक बड) "Break Bud" अवस्थेत आहे. या आठवड्यात (10 एप्रिल 2025) कोणतीही खते देण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. 

पण पुढील आठवड्यात (14 मे 2025) तुम्हाला खालील खते देण्याची शिफारस केली जाते:

### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **फेरस सल्फेट**: 800 ग्रॅम/एकर
- **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट**: 800 ग्रॅम/एकर

### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
1. **12-61-0**: 4 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 9 किलोग्राम/एकर
2. **24-24-0**: 7.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल 80%**: 1.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
3. **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट**: 12 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल 80%**: 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

**टीप**: फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल इतर खते लागू करण्यापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे वेगळे लागू करावे. कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट इतर खते लागू केल्यानंतर 15-20 मिनिटांनी लागू करावे.

तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी का?
messages.en:
The break bud for your vineyard is currently in the "break bud" stage. There is no need to give any fertilizer this week (April 10, 2025). 

But next week (May 14, 2025), you are recommended to be given the following fertilizers:

### In a Folier manner:
- **Ferrous sulfate**: 800 g/acre
- **Manganese sulfate**: 800 g/acre

### In a fertigation manner:
1. **12-61-0**: 4 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 9 kg/acre
2. **24-24-0**: 7.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 1.5 kg/acre
3. **Calcium nitrate**: 12 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3.5 kg/acre

**Note**: Apply phosphoric acid separately for 15-20 minutes before applying other fertilizers. Apply calcium nitrate 15-20 minutes after applying other fertilizers.

Is there anything else you need to know?

messages.content: धन्यवाद

messages.standalone_en: Thank you.

messages.en: Welcome! If you have anything else to ask, please let me know. Good luck with your vineyard!

Q: Sensor is showing wet, i.e. less kpa but soil looks dry.

messages.content: पाण्याचा टैंक किती आहे
messages.en: What is the water tank?
messages.standalone_question: What is the capacity of the water tank?
messages.standalone_en: What is the capacity of the water tank?

messages.content:
पाण्याचा टैंक म्हणजेच मातीतील पाण्याची साठवण क्षमता, जी पिकांच्या मुळांच्या क्षेत्रात असते. यामध्ये मातीचा प्रकार आणि पिकांच्या मुळांची खोली महत्त्वाची भूमिका बजावते. 

उदाहरणार्थ, जर मातीची खोली अधिक असेल, तर मातीमध्ये अधिक पाण्याची साठवण क्षमता असेल, ज्यामुळे पिकांना पाण्याची आवश्यकता असताना अधिक पाणी उपलब्ध असेल. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटमध्ये पाण्याची साठवण क्षमता मोजण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला मातीचा प्रकार, मुळांची खोली आणि इतर घटक विचारात घ्यावे लागतील. तुम्हाला याबद्दल अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया सांगा.
messages.en:
A water tank is the storage capacity of water in the soil, which is in the area of the roots of crops. The type of soil and the depth of the roots of the crops play an important role in this. 

For example, if the soil depth is high, the soil will have more water storage capacity, making more water available when crops need water. 

To measure water storage capacity in your plot, you have to take into account soil type, depth of roots and other factors. If you would like more information about this, please let me know.

messages.content: Updating time of app
messages.en: Updating time of app
messages.standalone_question: What is the process for updating the time of the app?
messages.standalone_en: What is the process for updating the time of the app?

messages.content:
To update the Fyllo app, follow these steps:

1. **For Android:**
   - Open the Google Play Store.
   - Tap on the menu icon (three horizontal lines) and select "My apps & games."
   - Look for the Fyllo app in the list and tap "Update" if available.

2. **For iOS:**
   - Open the App Store.
   - Tap on your profile icon at the top right.
   - Scroll down to see pending updates and look for the Fyllo app. Tap "Update" if available.

Make sure you have a stable internet connection while updating the app.

faq:
Q: How I check my Fyllo app version? Or how do I know my Fyllo app is updated or not?
A: In Fyllo app go to hamburger menu (click on “≡” three lines).
   Then scroll down, you will see Fyllo logo and app version under it.

Q: How can I reset or restart the Fyllo crop stage on the app?
A: For Hindi instructions, please watch this video: [फसल की स्टेज कैसे अपडेट करे ?](https://youtu.be/Gx2XUOGqNoA) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/Gx2XUOGqNoA/mqdefault.jpg). For English instructions, please watch this video: [How to update crop stages in App?](https://youtu.be/knCXf0vdN7k) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/knCXf0vdN7k/mqdefault.jpg). For additional info, contact the CRM team: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in.
Make sure to give both hindi and english links.

Q: How to measure/ calculate irrigation hours /water tank of my plot in fyllo app? How do I calculate irrigation hours for my plot? How to use the irrigation hours calculator?
A: To calculate irrigation hours in the Fyllo app, follow these steps:

1. Open the Fyllo App
2. Go to the home screen
3. Click on the soil moisture-1 sensor
4. Scroll down to find the "Irrigation hours" section
5. Fill in the required details such as:
   - Root width (inches)
   - Root depth (inches)
   - Soil retention (mm)
   - Dripper distance (feet)
   - Dripper discharge (liters)
6. Click the calculate button

Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for you right now? I can retrieve your plot's irrigation settings and perform the calculation if you say yes.

Tool Selection: When user says yes, I should:
1. Use get_irrigation_installation_settings tool to retrieve plot settings
2. Check if all values are present and valid
3. If values are valid, use calculate_irrigation_hours tool with these values
4. If values are missing or invalid, ask the user to provide the missing values
5. After calculating irrigation hours, display the irrigation installation settings that were used for the calculation
6. Ask the user if they want to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values, and if yes, prompt them to provide those values

Example response if values are missing:
"I checked your plot settings, but I need some additional information to calculate irrigation hours accurately. Could you please provide the [missing value(s)]? Once you provide these details, I can complete the calculation for you."

Example response after calculation:
"Based on your plot's irrigation settings, the calculated irrigation hours are [X] hours. 

I used the following settings for this calculation:
- Root width: [value] inches
- Root depth: [value] inches
- Soil retention: [value] mm
- Dripper distance: [value] feet
- Dripper discharge: [value] liters

Would you like to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values? If yes, please provide the new values you'd like to use."

Q: Where can I find the fertigation schedule in the Fyllo app?
A: To access the fertigation schedule:
    1. Open the Fyllo app
    2. Select "My Farm" at the bottom
    3. Tap on the "Fertigation" option
   You'll find the fertigation schedule there, including details about the required fertilizer applications.

Q: How does the Fyllo device work?
A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

messages.content:
To update the data time in the Fyllo app, you typically need to ensure that your device's date and time settings are correct. Here’s how you can do it:

1. **For Android:**
   - Go to "Settings" on your device.
   - Scroll down and tap on "System."
   - Tap on "Date & time."
   - Enable "Automatic date & time" to sync with the network or set it manually.

2. **For iOS:**
   - Open "Settings."
   - Tap on "General."
   - Select "Date & Time."
   - Enable "Set Automatically" or adjust the date and time manually.

After updating your device's date and time, restart the Fyllo app to ensure it syncs with the latest data. If you continue to experience issues, consider reinstalling the app or checking for updates.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં ખાતરની જરૂર છે. અહીં દરેક ખેતરના માટેની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ છે:

### 1. **Gharvalo (Muskmelon)**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** ફૂલ અને ફળ (Flowering and Fruiting)
- **વર્તમાન સપ્તાહ:** 2

**ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:**
- **દિવસ 1:** 
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન:** 
    - પોટેશિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
    - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
- **દિવસ 4:** 
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન:** 
    - કેલ્શિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
    - સલ્ફેટ ઓફ પોટાશ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર

### 2. **S.B.Solanki (Muskmelon)**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** વેગેટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **વર્તમાન સપ્તાહ:** 3

**ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:**
- **દિવસ 1:** 
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન:** 
    - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
    - એમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 6.5 કિગ્રા/એકર
- **દિવસ 4:** 
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન:** 
    - 12-61-0: 2 કિગ્રા/એકર
    - યુરિયા: 2.5 કિગ્રા/એકર

આ માહિતીના આધારે, ખાતર આપવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે જેથી તમારા પાકની વૃદ્ધિ અને ઉત્પાદનમાં સુધારો થાય.
messages.en:
Your farm needs fertilizer. Here's the fertigation schedule for each farm:

### 1. **Gharvalo (Muskmelon)**
- **Current stage:** Flowers and fruiting
- **Current Week:** 2

**Fertigation Schedule:**
- **Day 1:** 
  - **Fertigation:** 
    Potassium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
    Magnesium sulfate: 3 kg/acre
- **Day 4:** 
  - **Fertigation:** 
    Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
    - Sulfate of potash: 3 kg/acre

### 2. **S.B.Solanki (Muskmelon)**
- **Current phase:** Vegetative growth)
- **Current week:** 3

**Fertigation Schedule:**
- **Day 1:** 
  - **Fertigation:** 
    Magnesium sulfate: 3 kg/acre
    Ammonium sulfate: 6.5 kg/acre
- **Day 4:** 
  - **Fertigation:** 
    12-61-0: 2 kg/acre
    Urea: 2.5 kg/acre

Based on this information, it is important to fertilize so as to improve the growth and yield of your crop.

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: which are the insecticide and fungicide to be used for seed treatment
A: Insecticide:  Imidacloprid 600 FS – 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds
Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં જીણી ઈયળ અને મચ્છી માટે છાંટવાની જરૂર છે. હાલમાં, કોઈ ચોક્કસ દવા છાંટવાની સૂચના નથી, પરંતુ સામાન્ય રીતે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### **દવા છાંટવાની સૂચનો:**
1. **જીણી ઈયળ માટે:**
   - **Chlorpyriphos:** 5 મીલી/લિટર
   - **Thiamethoxam:** 0.5 ગ્રામ/લિટર

2. **મચ્છી માટે:**
   - **Lambda-cyhalothrin:** 1-2 મીલી/લિટર

આ દવાઓને છાંટવાથી તમારા પાકને સુરક્ષિત રાખવામાં મદદ મળશે. જો વધુ માહિતી અથવા મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો.
messages.en:
Your farm needs to be sprayed for live eels and fish. Currently, there is no specific drug prescribed to be sprayed, but in general, you can use the following medications:

### **Suggestions to spray the drug:**
1. **For the gini eel:**
   - **Chlorpyriphos:** 5 ml/litre
   * **Thiamethoxam:** 0.5 g/litre

2. **For fish:**
   - **Lambda-cyhalothrin:** 1-2 ml/litre

Spraying these medicines will help in protecting your crop. If more information or help is needed, please let us know.

હાલમાં, સુખારા માટે કોઈ ચોક્કસ દવા છાંટવાની સૂચના નથી. જો કે, જો તમે સુખારા માટે કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ દવા શોધી રહ્યા છો, તો સામાન્ય રીતે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### **સુખારા માટે દવાઓ:**
1. **Fungicides:** 
   - **Mancozeb:** 2-3 ગ્રામ/લિટર
   - **Copper Oxychloride:** 2-3 ગ્રામ/લિટર

2. **Insecticides:** 
   - **Imidacloprid:** 0.5-1 મીલી/લિટર

આ દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે સુખારા સામે તમારા પાકને સુરક્ષિત રાખી શકો છો. જો વધુ માહિતી અથવા મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો.
messages.en:
At present, there is no instruction to spray any specific medicine for sukhara. However, if you are looking for a specific drug for sukhara, in general, you can use the following medications:

### **Medicines for Sukhara:**
1. **Fungicides:** 
   - **Mancozeb:** 2-3 g/litre
   - **Copper Oxychloride:** 2-3 g/litre

2. **Insecticides:** 
   **Imidacloprid:** 0.5-1 ml/litre

By using these medicines, you can protect your crop against dryness. If more information or help is needed, please let us know.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં ખાતરની જરૂર છે. અહીં દરેક ખેતરના માટેની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ છે:

### 1. **Gharvalo (Muskmelon)**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** ફૂલ અને ફળ (Flowering and Fruiting)
- **વર્તમાન સપ્તાહ:** 2

**ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:**
- **દિવસ 1:** 
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન:** 
    - પોટેશિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
    - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
- **દિવસ 4:** 
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન:** 
    - કેલ્શિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
    - સલ્ફેટ ઓફ પોટાશ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર

### 2. **S.B.Solanki (Muskmelon)**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** વેગેટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **વર્તમાન સપ્તાહ:** 3

**ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:**
- **દિવસ 1:** 
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન:** 
    - મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
    - એમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ: 6.5 કિગ્રા/એકર
- **દિવસ 4:** 
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન:** 
    - 12-61-0: 2 કિગ્રા/એકર
    - યુરિયા: 2.5 કિગ્રા/એકર

આ માહિતીના આધારે, ખાતર આપવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે જેથી તમારા પાકની વૃદ્ધિ અને ઉત્પાદનમાં સુધારો થાય.
messages.en:
Your farm needs fertilizer. Here's the fertigation schedule for each farm:

### 1. **Gharvalo (Muskmelon)**
- **Current stage:** Flowers and fruiting
- **Current Week:** 2

**Fertigation Schedule:**
- **Day 1:** 
  - **Fertigation:** 
    Potassium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
    Magnesium sulfate: 3 kg/acre
- **Day 4:** 
  - **Fertigation:** 
    Calcium nitrate: 3 kg/acre
    - Sulfate of potash: 3 kg/acre

### 2. **S.B.Solanki (Muskmelon)**
- **Current phase:** Vegetative growth)
- **Current week:** 3

**Fertigation Schedule:**
- **Day 1:** 
  - **Fertigation:** 
    Magnesium sulfate: 3 kg/acre
    Ammonium sulfate: 6.5 kg/acre
- **Day 4:** 
  - **Fertigation:** 
    12-61-0: 2 kg/acre
    Urea: 2.5 kg/acre

Based on this information, it is important to fertilize so as to improve the growth and yield of your crop.

messages.content: મારા ખેતરમાં કઈ દવા છાંટવાની જરૂર છે
messages.en: What medicine needs to be sprayed on my farm
messages.standalone_question: What pesticide should I spray in my field?
messages.standalone_en: What pesticide should I spray in my field?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: which are the insecticide and fungicide to be used for seed treatment
A: Insecticide:  Imidacloprid 600 FS – 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds
Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content: તમારા ખેતરમાં (Gharvalo અને S.B.Solanki) હાલ કોઈ દવા છાંટવાની જરૂર નથી. જો કે, જો તમે કોઈ ખાસ સમસ્યા અનુભવો છો, તો કૃપા કરીને વધુ માહિતી આપો.
messages.en: There is currently no need to spray any medicine on your farm (Gharvalo and S.B. Solanki). However, if you experience any particular problem, please provide more information.

messages.content_transliterated: mara khetaraman jini iyal che ane macchi che

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં જીણી ઈયળ અને મચ્છી માટે છાંટવાની જરૂર છે. હાલમાં, કોઈ ચોક્કસ દવા છાંટવાની સૂચના નથી, પરંતુ સામાન્ય રીતે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### **દવા છાંટવાની સૂચનો:**
1. **જીણી ઈયળ માટે:**
   - **Chlorpyriphos:** 5 મીલી/લિટર
   - **Thiamethoxam:** 0.5 ગ્રામ/લિટર

2. **મચ્છી માટે:**
   - **Lambda-cyhalothrin:** 1-2 મીલી/લિટર

આ દવાઓને છાંટવાથી તમારા પાકને સુરક્ષિત રાખવામાં મદદ મળશે. જો વધુ માહિતી અથવા મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો.
messages.en:
Your farm needs to be sprayed for live eels and fish. Currently, there is no specific drug prescribed to be sprayed, but in general, you can use the following medications:

### **Suggestions to spray the drug:**
1. **For the gini eel:**
   - **Chlorpyriphos:** 5 ml/litre
   * **Thiamethoxam:** 0.5 g/litre

2. **For fish:**
   - **Lambda-cyhalothrin:** 1-2 ml/litre

Spraying these medicines will help in protecting your crop. If more information or help is needed, please let us know.

messages.content_transliterated: sukhara mate mate kai dava aapi

messages.content:
હાલમાં, સુખારા માટે કોઈ ચોક્કસ દવા છાંટવાની સૂચના નથી. જો કે, જો તમે સુખારા માટે કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ દવા શોધી રહ્યા છો, તો સામાન્ય રીતે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### **સુખારા માટે દવાઓ:**
1. **Fungicides:** 
   - **Mancozeb:** 2-3 ગ્રામ/લિટર
   - **Copper Oxychloride:** 2-3 ગ્રામ/લિટર

2. **Insecticides:** 
   - **Imidacloprid:** 0.5-1 મીલી/લિટર

આ દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે સુખારા સામે તમારા પાકને સુરક્ષિત રાખી શકો છો. જો વધુ માહિતી અથવા મદદની જરૂર હોય, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો.
messages.en:
At present, there is no instruction to spray any specific medicine for sukhara. However, if you are looking for a specific drug for sukhara, in general, you can use the following medications:

### **Medicines for Sukhara:**
1. **Fungicides:** 
   - **Mancozeb:** 2-3 g/litre
   - **Copper Oxychloride:** 2-3 g/litre

2. **Insecticides:** 
   **Imidacloprid:** 0.5-1 ml/litre

By using these medicines, you can protect your crop against dryness. If more information or help is needed, please let us know.

messages.content: Ok
messages.en: Ok

A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

By using these medicines, you can protect your crop against dryness. If more information or help is needed, please let us know.

messages.content:
तुमच्या दाखवलेल्या चित्रात, द्राक्षांच्या वेलींची आरोग्य स्थिती चिंताजनक दिसत आहे. काही पानांवर कोरडेपणा आणि वाळलेले दिसत आहे, ज्यामुळे ताण किंवा रोगाची शक्यता आहे.

अधिक अचूक विश्लेषणासाठी, कृपया प्रभावित भागांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करून एक स्पष्ट चित्र घेण्याचा विचार करा. 

जर तुम्हाला कोणत्याही विशिष्ट रोग किंवा कीड असल्याची शंका असेल, तर मी तुमच्या पिकाच्या अवस्थेनुसार स्प्रे शिफारसी देऊ शकतो.
messages.en:
In your picture, the health condition of the grape vines looks alarming. Some leaves appear to be dry and dry, which can lead to strain or disease.

For a more accurate analysis, please consider taking a clearer picture focusing on the affected areas. 

If you suspect you have a specific disease or pest, I can offer spray recommendations based on the condition of your crop.

messages.content:
तुमच्या दाखवलेल्या चित्रात द्राक्षांच्या वेलींची पानं हिरवी आणि आरोग्यदायी दिसत आहेत, ज्यामुळे चांगली वाढ दर्शवते. तथापि, विशिष्ट रोग किंवा कीड असल्यास, जवळून निरीक्षण करणे आवश्यक आहे.

भविष्यातील चित्रांसाठी, कृपया खालील गोष्टी लक्षात ठेवा:
- प्रभावित भागांवर लक्ष केंद्रित करा.
- चित्र जवळून काढा.

जर तुम्हाला कोणत्याही समस्यांची शंका असेल, तर कृपया त्यांचे वर्णन करा, आणि मी अधिक मार्गदर्शन करू शकतो.
messages.en:
In your picture, the leaves of the grape vines look green and healthy, indicating good growth. However, if there is a specific disease or pest, close monitoring is necessary.

For future pictures, please remember the following:
- Focus on the affected areas.
- Take a closer look at the picture.

If you suspect any problems, please describe them, and I can provide further guidance.
